project_path.PancakeForkToken: contracts/CAKF Standart Smart Contract Security Audit/PancakeForkToken

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: In MasterChef contract, massUpdateStakePools() and massUpdatePools() functions use a loop to update all pools.
findings.location: MasterChef contract, massUpdateStakePools() and massUpdatePools() functions

findings.title: Inappropriate type
findings.description: MasterChef contract has the variable stakeUserInfo initialized as a map that uses pool id as a key.
